comment.author: Dakota
comment.text: Shes dishonest and her running mate looks like the grinch..he cant even wear a tie to rallies.Hillary would divide our nation even more than it is now .We need a true American Leader that will work for us and put America first . American people will see what our country is made of .We have such potential yet are being held down by our own gov .Trump will unite us and make our country strong and most of all respected again .Hillary doesnt have what it takes ...she does NOT work for us she works for them . .Her emails proved that in black and white .Dont look the other way .She sold us out many times before .What kind of leader does that ..a crooked one.Shes not to be trusted ....that is not an opinion.That is a fact ...again proven in her own words ...read the emails .They are much more cringe worthy than anything Trump as ever said or done !!
